Description: Sum of sales by invoice date, previous month reversal, and delivered and not invoiced sales for the current month.
Sum of sales by invoice date.
Sum of revenue reversal of previous month and delivered sales not invoiced for the current month.
Cost of Goods Sold (COGS) is the sum of production by ship date and shipping costs by deliver date.
Sum of production expenses by ship date.
Sum of shipping expenses by deliver date.
Ratio of Gross Profit to Revenue
Sum of expenses for SG&A, Marketing, and Depreciation.
Sum of expenses for Sales, General, and Administration.
Sum of expenses associated with Marketing.
Sum of expenses associated with depreciation for assets.
Difference of Operational Expenses (OpEx) from Gross Profit.
Ratio of Operating Profit to Revenue.
